import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";

import SecuritySchemes from "@theme/ApiExplorer/SecuritySchemes";

import SchemaTabs from "@theme/SchemaTabs";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get LDAP Integration Settings</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/api/v31.02/settings/ldap"}></MethodEndpoint>



```
x-prisma-cloud-target-env: {"permission":"authConfiguration","saas":false,"self-hosted":true}
x-public: true
```



Returns the LDAP integration settings.

## cURL Request

Refer to the following example cURL request:

```bash
$ curl -k \
  -u <USER> \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -X GET \
  "https://<CONSOLE>/api/v<VERSION>/settings/ldap"
```

## cURL Response

Refer to the following example cURL response:

```bash
$ {
 "enabled": true,
 "url": "ldap://10.176.135.212:379",
 "caCert": "",
 "searchBase": "",
 "groupSearchBase": "ou=Groups,dc=example,dc=org",
 "userSearchBase": "ou=Users,dc=example,dc=org",
 "accountUpn": "cn=admin,dc=example,dc=org",
 "accountPassword": {
   "encrypted": "nkMtVY4NN9RccvbVIfLvJw=="
 },
 "type": "openldap",
 "userSearchIdentifier": "cn"
}
```


<div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

LdapSettings are the ldap connectivity settings

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>accountPassword</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object</span></span></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><div style={{"marginTop":".5rem","marginBottom":".5rem"}}>

Secret Stores the plain and encrypted version of a value. The plain version is not stored in a database

</div><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"encrypted"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Specifies an encrypted value of the secret.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"plain"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Specifies the plain text value of the secret.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"accountUpn"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} collapsible={false} name={"caCert"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"CaCert is cert in PEM format (optional, if not specified, skip_verify flag will be used).\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"enabled"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Enabled indicates whether LDAP is enabled.\n","type":"boolean"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"groupSearchBase"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"GroupSearchBase is the LDAP search pattern for groups.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"searchBase"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"SearchBase is the LDAP search pattern.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"type"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Type specifies the LDAP server type (AD or OpenLDAP).\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"url"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"URL is the ldap server url.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"userSearchBase"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"UserSearchBase is the LDAP search pattern for users.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"userSearchIdentifier"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"UserSearchIdentifier is the user identifier to use for querying open ldap (e.g., cn -> cn=user).\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n
